title: Ekushey Book Fair 2026 to kick off on Feb 20
body: The fair schedule was finalized at an emergency meeting held this afternoon at Bangla Academy, according to a press release The Bangla Academy authorities have announced that the Amar Ekushey Book Fair-2026 will begin on February 20 and continue till March 15. The inaugural ceremony of the country's largest annual literary event will take place at 11am. The fair schedule was finalized at an emergency meeting held this afternoon at the Shaheed Munir Chowdhury Conference Room of Bangla Academy, said a press release. Bangla Academy Director General Professor Mohammad Azam, Cultural Affairs Ministry Secretary, Md Mofidur Rahman, academy directors, Dhaka University Proctor Professor Saifuddin Ahmed, representatives of publishers and members of law enforcement agencies were present at the meeting.
